content: instructions unless otherwise stated all stitches are worked into the current floating ring beginning sequence 1 begin first ww fdtr ch2 dtr 4 times ch2 2 begin 6 more wws fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr ch2 6 times 6 times 7 wws started in total 3 work 3 base wws a begin first base ww fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr ch2 twice b begin middle base ww fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 3 times ch2 dtr 3 times ch2 c work last base ww fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr ch2 dtr 10 times ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 d finish middle base ww dtr ch2 4 times dtr ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 e finish first base ww dtr ch2 8 times dtr ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 use the 3 stitch markers that are of the same color and put one in each of these 3 base wws put a stitch marker in each remaining ww continue base of bag 4 first joined foundation row dtr ch2 twice in next floating ring breakaway to next ww fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 3 times ch2 dtr ch2 breakaway to next ww 3 times fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 5 times ch2 dtr ch2 breakaway to next ww 2 times fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 3 times ch2 dtr ch2 breakaway to next ww 3 times fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 9 times ch2 dtr 2 times ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 10 partial wws 5 first return row in next ww dtr ch2 6 times dtr ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 3 times in next ww dtr ch2 4 times dtr ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 2 times in next ww dtr ch2 6 times dtr ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 3 times in next marked ww dtr ch2 twice dtr ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 3 6 second joined foundation row dtr ch2 twice in next floating ring breakaway to next ww fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 5 times ch2 dtr ch2 breakaway to next ww fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 3 times ch2 dtr ch2 breakaway to next ww 3 times fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 5 times ch2 dtr ch2 breakaway to next ww 3 times fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 3 times ch2 dtr ch2 breakaway to next ww fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 5 times ch2 dtr ch2 breakaway to next ww twice fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 3 times ch2 dtr ch2 breakaway to next ww fdtr ch1 join ch1 dtr 9 times ch2 dtr 2 times ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 16 partial wws 7 second return row in next ww dtr ch2 4 times dtr ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 14 times in next marked ww dtr ch2 twice dtr ch1 slip_stitch in next ch2 space ch1 bag sides 8 foundation row in next marked ww dtr ch2 twice breakaway to next
